item.title: Remove lothy as a op
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Half of you guys don’t get it. At the end of the day, the people need to ask themselves this: “Am I using an IRC channel that’s aimed at amusing 12yr olds, or am I using a channel that’s there for members of a programming community to have mildly adult-orientated discussion?”
I’d be guilty as charged if I was the channel operator of a channel aimed at young kids/young teenagers. However, last time I checked this was a community for programming. Having said that, I don’t see how kicking people for acting like morons is anything short of service to the rest of the channel’s users.

As for it being abuse, well what can I say. I take the same course of action as forum staff would. If anything I’m far more lenient, seeing as bans I place are usually a day or two at the most.

Speaking of abuse though, Xerxes, isn’t ban evasion against the rules? Or is it ok because you’re you?

Ferty:

Lothy, does not abuse, and he does not force his views on anyone. Most likely he told you that you were being a douche and to stop it and because you didnt agree/stop you got banned am I right? post logs prove me wrong

He wasn’t banned. We just disagree when it comes to politics; I choose democracy, and he chooses dictatorship.

Read full topic
